## Getting Started

The `antedep` package fits antedependence models for longitudinal data...
```{r}
library(antedep)
data("bolus_inad")
plot_profile(bolus_inad$y)
```

## Fitting a Model
```{r}
fit <- fit_inad(bolus_inad$y, order = 1)
fit$log_l
```
